title: Customer Complaints - Unexpected $300,000 Bill
description: Customer is calling regarding an unexpected bill of $300,000. They are disputing the charges and threatening to escalate to management. Need immediate investigation into billing system and customer account.
error_logs: Customer ID: CUST-12345, Bill Amount: $300,000, Date: 2024-01-15
codebase_context: Billing service running on AWS Lambda, DynamoDB for customer data storage

title: DynamoDB Data Retrieval Failure
description: Unable to pull data from DynamoDB. Customer data queries are failing, affecting multiple services including billing and customer support. Database connection timeouts occurring.
error_logs: DynamoDB ConnectionTimeoutException: Unable to connect to cluster. Read capacity exceeded.
codebase_context: DynamoDB cluster in us-east-1, multiple Lambda functions accessing customer data

title: Liquidation and Collateral Calculation System Down
description: Critical system for calculating liquidation and collateral in 40 microservices architecture is experiencing failures. Go and Java services are unable to process margin calculations.
error_logs: Go service panics in liquidation-engine, Java service timeouts in collateral-calculator
codebase_context: 40 microservices architecture, Go language for core services, Java for calculations, Ruby on Rails for web interface

title: Misconfiguration Causing Deployment Failures
description: Bad feature deployment due to configuration misconfigurations. New feature is causing system instability and needs immediate rollback. Deployment pipeline is compromised.
error_logs: Configuration validation failed during deployment. Feature flag conflicts detected.
codebase_context: Microservices deployment on Kubernetes, feature flags in Redis, trading data pipeline

title: Critical Server Downtime - Monetary and Reputation Loss
description: Production servers have shut down unexpectedly, causing significant monetary loss and reputation damage. Banking services are completely unavailable to customers.
error_logs: Server shutdown detected at 2024-01-15 07:00:00. All primary servers offline.
codebase_context: Mainframe systems, distributed banking architecture, disaster recovery systems

title: Employee Authentication System Failure
description: Authenticator for employees is not working, preventing staff from accessing critical systems. Traffic spikes are overwhelming the authentication service.
error_logs: MFA token validation failing, high CPU usage on auth servers due to traffic spikes
codebase_context: OAuth2/OIDC authentication, Azure AD integration, high traffic volume

title: Data Input Capacity Exceeded - IP/Subnet Issues
description: System hitting capacity limits on data inputs. Running on IPs and subnets that are at maximum utilization. Transaction processing is being throttled.
error_logs: Network capacity exceeded on subnet 10.0.1.0/24, data input queue backlog of 10,000+ transactions
codebase_context: Distributed data processing, multiple IP ranges, high-volume transaction system

title: Slow Query Race Condition - Inventory Conflicts
description: Poor speed queries causing race conditions when two customers purchase the same item. Slow query fired before fast query loses, creating inventory conflicts and order failures.
error_logs: Query timeout on inventory check, race condition detected in order processing
codebase_context: PostgreSQL database, Rails application, inventory locking mechanisms

title: Bot Traffic Overwhelming Platform
description: Malicious bots are overwhelming the Shopify platform, causing performance degradation and affecting legitimate customer transactions.
error_logs: High bot traffic detected from multiple IP ranges, rate limiting triggered
codebase_context: Rails application with bot detection, CDN integration, API rate limiting

title: Database CPU at Capacity - Write Operations Failing
description: Too many writes to the database causing CPU utilization to reach 100%. No more write operations can occur, blocking all order processing and inventory updates.
error_logs: Database CPU at 100%, write queue full, connection pool exhausted
codebase_context: PostgreSQL cluster, high write volume, connection pooling

title: AWS RDS Utilization Critical - Distributed System Issues
description: AWS RDS utilization is too high, causing distributed system performance issues. Similar to Shopify's problems with high database load affecting multiple services.
error_logs: RDS CPU utilization at 95%, connection timeouts, slow query performance
codebase_context: AWS RDS PostgreSQL, distributed microservices architecture, high data volume

title: LLM Provider Response Delays - Product Bottleneck
description: LLM providers are taking too long to respond, causing product bottlenecks and user experience degradation. AI-powered features are timing out.
error_logs: LLM API timeouts, response times > 30 seconds, circuit breaker triggered
codebase_context: Multiple LLM provider integrations, AI feature pipeline, timeout handling

title: Kubernetes Pod Clusters Failing Sporadically
description: Kubernetes pods and clusters are going down sporadically, causing downtime that is costing offshore teams productivity and affecting customer service.
error_logs: Pod evictions detected, cluster nodes becoming unresponsive, resource constraints
codebase_context: Kubernetes cluster management, pod auto-scaling, resource monitoring

title: Customer Complaints - Multiple Service Issues
description: Three customer complaints received regarding service reliability. Downtime is affecting customer satisfaction and offshore team productivity.
error_logs: Customer complaint tickets: #1234, #1235, #1236 - all related to service availability
codebase_context: Customer support system, offshore team collaboration tools, service monitoring
